short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Study assistant designed to streamline your learning and school preparation process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Examio is a learning assistant designed to streamline your learning and school preparation process.

Using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence, Examio offers a comprehensive range of services tailored for students:

- **Question Solving**: With cutting-edge AI, Examio effortlessly solves any question in the school environment. Whether the question is entered manually or mediated via camera or gallery, the app quickly extracts and interprets the text using advanced OCR algorithms and provides an accurate answer in seconds.

More services will be introduced soonâ€¦

The browser extension is add-on to the mobile app, where you can register, see your questions, refill coins, etc.

Improve your academic performance with Examio - the app that makes studying more efficient.
